definition: to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order
abbr. for 論語|论语[Lun2 yu3], The Analects (of Confucius)
opinion/view/theory/doctrine/to discuss/to talk about/to regard/to consider/per/by the (kilometer, hour etc)
don't pass judgment on a person's life until the lid is on the coffin (idiom)
thirty percent failure, seventy percent success, the official PRC verdict on Mao Zedong

sentences.english: Finally, it confuses the ambit of historical determinism and historical non-determinism.
sentences.chinese: 其四，混淆机械决定论和辩证决定论的局限。

sentences.english: Finally, it confuses the ambit of historical determinism and historical non-determinism.
sentences.chinese: 其四，混淆机械决定论和辩证决定论的局限。

sentences.english: Wood inkstone began to research, but not when, in qing dynasty.
sentences.chinese: 木砚研究始于何时，没有定论，但以清代居多。

sentences.english: Finally, the final conclusion she could explain her position when the great.
sentences.chinese: 她能最后定论，说明她当的官位很大。

sentences.english: For Walcott and Gervinho a decision will be made on Saturday or Sunday.
sentences.chinese: 至于沃尔科特和热尔维尼奥，周六或周日将有定论。

sentences.english: "He knew people would jump to conclusions about him, " she says.
sentences.chinese: “他知道人们会对他下什么样的定论，”她说。

sentences.english: Scholars still have divergent ideas on the teachability of communicative strategies.
sentences.chinese: 对学生交际策略是否具有可教性，学者仍然没有定论。

sentences.english: The optimum density is difficult to specify in terms of trees per acre .
sentences.chinese: 很难定论究竟每英亩多少株树为最适密度。

sentences.english: In academic circles, the problem on Sang Hongyang s involving himself in King of Yans rebellion has no final conclusion.
sentences.chinese: 对桑弘羊参与燕王谋反问题，学术界迄今尚无定论。

sentences.english: The status of Ouyangxiu, in the history of politics and literature, has been defined.
sentences.chinese: 欧阳修在历史和文学上的地位，几乎已有定论。

sentences.english: This is one piece of dogmatism that a scientist can allow himself.
sentences.chinese: 这一条教条定论是一个科学家能够任凭他自己接受的。

sentences.english: But the greater halfs all chance positive wife solid spoil of tool, fate how can not hard conclusion.
sentences.chinese: 却大半都成为正妻固宠的工具，命运如何无法定论。

sentences.english: There is no consensus yet on the nature of the sentence initial nominal element in Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 汉语的句首名词性成分到底是什么，至今尚无定论。

sentences.english: The author attempts to avoid technology determinism starting off from the media.
sentences.chinese: 在研究中力避单纯从媒介出发的技术决定论。

sentences.english: Previous research seemed to have settled any doubts.
sentences.chinese: 对此，此前的研究结果似乎已经给出不容置疑的定论。

sentences.english: The lack of steel, building what side a side B is finalized .
sentences.chinese: 由于缺乏钢性规定，办公楼究竟孰甲孰乙难有定论。

definition: don't pass judgment on a person's life until the lid is on the coffin (idiom)
conclusion/verdict/CL:個|个[ge4]/to conclude/to reach a verdict
to make a definitive judgment/to come to a firm conclusion
to discuss/to bring up various ideas for discussion
to determine the nature (usually of error or crime)/to determine chemical composition/qualitative/fixed
to conclude/to determine/to come to a judgment
